layout:
#Dynamic
echo "Making the disk partitions"
virtual=0
seamicro=0
release_ver=<%= operatingsystem.major %>
cat <<EOF >/tmp/diskpart.cfg
ignoredisk --only-use=sda
zerombr
clearpart --all --initlabel --drives=sda
part /boot --asprimary --fstype="zfs" --size=1024 --ondisk=sda
name: Terraform Test Partition Table
